name: Prestorio
description:
You appear in a strange but in the same time beautiful place where many things look familiar to you. Explore this weird place and try to find at least some information about your appearance! Game has teleports, interactive dialogues and objects. Through the game you will find a guy who lives there - George. Be careful, it's your choice whether to trust George or not.  Remember, do not seek for exit! 

This atmospheric place will help you to get a break from the real world. Music is playing through the whole game while you are exploring. Enjoy!
